name: All In your head (Yoshihide)
description:
This was created as a submission for Brackeys Game Jam 2022.1

Overview:

'All In Your Head' is a psychological horror game about managing your mental state. Inspired by games such as 'I'm On Observation Duty', you are left alone in a basement with nothing but some cameras, a phone and your thoughts. Monitor surveillance cameras to check for hallucinations, and click and hold to rectify them. The longer you let these hallucinations stay, the more dangerous it gets...

How to play:

- Watch every room through the camera (accessed by clicking on your computer), and look out for any changes that occur to the rooms.

- Click and hold on hallucinations to fix them. The longer you ignore a hallucination, the more your sanity will drop.

- The creature will manifest as your sanity deteriorates. Use the phone besides you to call for help, but be aware as this takes time, and is on a lengthy cooldown.

- Hang in there, help will arrive at 6AM.
